card_text: Activate 1 of these effects, but skip your next Battle Phase after activation;$N●Target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls; negate its effects (until the end of this turn), then banish the top 3 cards of your opponent's Deck.$N●Special Summon 1 "Runick" monster from your Extra Deck to the Extra Monster Zone.$NYou can only activate 1 "Runick Freezing Curses" per turn.
